user.title: Behaviour Monitor Setup
user.description: Configure Behaviour Monitor to learn entity state patterns and detect anomalies using statistical analysis and machine learning.

data_description.monitored_entities: Select the entities whose state changes should be monitored for pattern learning.
data_description.sensitivity: Higher sensitivity detects smaller deviations. Low = 3σ (extreme only), Medium = 2σ, High = 1σ (any deviation).
data_description.learning_period: Number of days to collect data before statistical anomaly detection activates.
data_description.enable_notifications: Send persistent notifications when anomalies are detected.
data_description.enable_ml: Enable Half-Space Trees ML for advanced pattern detection and cross-sensor correlation analysis.
data_description.ml_learning_period: Minimum days before ML anomaly notifications are sent.
data_description.retrain_period: How often to retrain the ML model with new data.
data_description.cross_sensor_window: Time window (seconds) for detecting correlated activity between different sensors.
data_description.track_attributes: Also count attribute-only changes (not just state changes). Enable this if your entities update attributes without changing state.
data_description.notify_services: Services to send mobile notifications (e.g., notify.mobile_app_iphone). Add multiple services to notify multiple devices. Leave empty to only use persistent notifications in the HA UI.
